example.eg: If the statement is true, then we will have to accept the conclusion.
example.egtrans: 如果陈述真实，那么我们只能接受这个结论。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 如果, 倘若, 假使

example.eg: I'll only buy the car if they fix the brakes first.
example.egtrans: 只有他们先修好刹车，我才会买那辆车。

example.eg: If you're such a good driver, how can you explain that accident last year?
example.egtrans: 如果你真的是个好驾驶员，那么如何解释去年的那起事故？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 假如, 假设, 如果

example.eg: Do you know if he's coming to the party?
example.egtrans: 你知道他是否会来参加聚会吗？

example.eg: It's a depressing if predictable piece of news.
example.egtrans: 即使事先能够预料到，这个消息也让人心情抑郁。

example.eg: If only I'd known!
example.egtrans: 我当时要知道就好了！

example.eg: Smith's decision to run for election is still a big if.
example.egtrans: 史密斯决定参与竞选还只不过是假设。

example.eg: No ifs or buts allowed!
example.egtrans: 不准找借口！

example.eg: He looked as if he wanted to say something.
example.egtrans: 他看起来好像想要说些什么。

example.eg: You're going to help me clean the house? As if!
example.egtrans: 说得好像你真的要帮我打扫房子一样！

dsense.name: as if on cue, as though on cue

example.eg: Tom was thinking about his mother when, as if on cue, she knocked on his front door.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 似乎得到暗示, 仿佛在暗示

example.eg: He nodded at her as if to say goodbye.
I forgot to ask whether he could give me a lift to the party.
example.egtrans: 我忘记问他可不可以开车送我去派对了。

example.eg: Rita asked me if I wanted dinner.
example.egtrans: 瑞塔问我要不要吃晚饭。

dsense.name: damned if you do, damned if you do and damned if you don't

example.eg: I doubt if I can help you.
Even if we never see each other again, I'll always remember you.  I'd still love chocolate even if everyone else hated it.
example.egtrans: 即使我们不会再相见了，不过我会一直记得你。即使其他人都讨厌它，我仍会喜欢巧克力。

example.eg: Minors are not admitted except if accompanied by an adult.

dsense.name: I'll be damned if, also US: I'll be darned if

example.eg: I'll be damned if I'm going to let you take our son!

dsense.name: if and only if
dsense.guideword: (on the strict condition that) (强调用语)

example.eg: I'll help you, if and only if, you promise to do your part.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 在…情况下而且只有在此种情况下
如果那时, 只有当....的时候

example.eg: Too tall?  No, if anything she's too short to play goalie!
example.egtrans: 太高了？没有吧，正相反她就是太矮了才不适合当守门员。

example.eg: In this part of the country, it only snows a few days per year, if at all.
If clauses begin with the word "if."
Pop by if ever you feel like a chat.
This method is rarely, if ever, employed today.
Your meal looks disgusting; if I were you, I'd complain.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 如果我是你的话, 如果是我的话

dsense.name: if it be so
dsense.guideword: literary (in that case, if so) (书面语)

example.eg: I don't believe he would lie to you, but if it be so, you should not trust him again.

dsense.name: if memory serves, if my memory serves, if my memory serves me

trans_examp.trans_cn: 如果没记错的话, 如果我记得不错的话

example.eg: I'm ready to stay late if necessary.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 如果要求, 如果需要

example.eg: Let's see if Pete is free this evening. If not, we can always go without him.
example.egtrans: 我们去问问皮特今晚空不空。如果不空的话，就我们去。

example.eg: It's a long flight, but if nothing else, you can finish reading that novel.

dsense.name: if only
dsense.guideword: (expressing a wish) (表示对将来的假设)

example.eg: If only I had a million dollars!
example.egtrans: 要是我有一百万美元就好了！

trans_examp.trans_cn: 要是…（多好），但愿…, 当时要是…（就好了）

dsense.name: if only
dsense.guideword: (on the single condition that) (表示条件)

example.eg: This plan will work if only we get enough funding for it.
example.egtrans: 只要我们筹集到足够的资金，这个计划就能实施。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 如果可能, 如果可能的话

example.eg: Are you going shopping? If so, may I come with you?
example.egtrans: 你要去购物么？如果这样，能带上我么？

example.eg: I plan to come to the party, but will let you know if something crops up to prevent me coming.

dsense.name: if the need arises
dsense.guideword: formal (should it turn out to be necessary)

example.eg: If the need arises I will hire a car to drive you to the airport.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 如果有必要, 如果需要

dsense.name: "if the shoe fits, wear it" (US), "if the cap fits, wear it" (UK)
dsense.guideword: figurative (you should accept truth of criticism)

trans_examp.trans_cn: 要是批评中肯，就接受吧, 如果是真的，就承认吧

dsense.name: if truth be told, truth be told

trans_examp.trans_cn: 如果说实话, 请恕我直言

example.eg: And then, if you please, he actually asked me if I had any grandchildren! I'm only 32!
Come this way, if you please.  Take a seat, if you please.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 请, 如果你愿意，如果你不介意

dsense.name: if you say so
dsense.guideword: (I disagree but do not want to argue) (表示说话人不赞同)

dsense.name: if you say so
dsense.guideword: (I tentatively agree) (表示说话人赞同但稍有迟疑)

example.eg: I can lend you some money if you want.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 如你所愿, 如果你想的话

example.eg: We can always postpone the meet-up for another time, if you wish - it's up to you.

dsense.name: make as if to do [sth], make as though to do [sth]

example.eg: He made as if to throw the ball, but he actually ran with it instead.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 假装做某事, 佯装做某事

example.eg: I'll go, but only if you go with me.
I'll see if my father knows anything about it.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 看看, 查明, 搞清楚

dsense.name: seldom if ever, seldom, if ever

example.eg: I seldom, if ever, have time to relax and read a book.
So what if I enjoy a beer now and then?

dsense.name: sound as though, sound as if

example.eg: It sounds as though you could do with a vacation!
example.egtrans: 听起来好像是你亟需休假！

trans_examp.trans_cn: 好像, 仿佛, 似乎

example.eg: What if she never comes back?
example.egtrans: 如果她再也不回来怎么办？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 如果…将会怎么样, 如果…怎么办？
我会让你知道我是对的, 你等着瞧
